trans-unit.source: Add a new chapter and then start typing.
trans-unit.target: Nejdříve přidej novou kapitolu a poté začni psát.

trans-unit.source: It seems that there is new update in the store!
trans-unit.target: Vypadá to, že je k dispozici nová aktualizace!

trans-unit.source: Are you enjoying this app? Please consider leaving a review on Microsoft Store.
trans-unit.target: Líbí se ti tato aplikace? Pokud ano, byli bychom rádi, kdybys zvážil/a ji ohodnotit na Microsoft Store.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred your file couldn't be load.
trans-unit.target: Narazili jsme na problém, projekt nemohl být načten.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred your file couldn't be saved.
trans-unit.target: Narazili jsme na problém, projekt nemohl být uložen.

trans-unit.source: This file already exists! Change the name or location otherwise, the file is gonna be replaced.
trans-unit.target: Tento soubor se již v této složce nachází! Pokud nechceš o původní přijít, změň název nebo umísti soubor jinam.

trans-unit.source: Set a custom name. To set the place of numbering use {number}
trans-unit.target: Zvol vlastní jméno pro kapitolu. Pro výběr, kde bude zobrazeno číslování přidej k textu {cislo}.

trans-unit.source: If you are on the last chapter and Ctrl+Page down is pressed, should it automatically add a new chapter?
trans-unit.target: Automatické přidání nové kapitoly na konci listu pomocí stisku Ctrl+PageDown.

trans-unit.source: Hey! Slow down a little bit! Did you want to exit without saving your progress?
trans-unit.target: Zpomal trochu! Opravdu chceš odejít bez uložení své práce?

trans-unit.source: Right click on this text or on the arrow above to rename
trans-unit.target: Klikni pravým na tento text nebo na šipku výše pro přejmenování této kapitoly

trans-unit.source: Add a new chapter and then start typing.
trans-unit.target: Nejdříve přidej novou kapitolu a poté začni psát.

trans-unit.source: After changing this setting, a restart is required for changes to fully apply.
trans-unit.target: Po změně tohoto nastavení bude nutný restart, aby se plně projevily změny.

trans-unit.source: The application remembers what project was last open and tries to load it on the next startup.
trans-unit.target: Aplikace si zapamatuje jaký projekt byl naposledy otevřený a pokusí se ho načíst při dalším spuštění.

trans-unit.source: You did not finish the goal you set. Do you really want to quit?
trans-unit.target: Nastavený cíl zatím nebyl splněn, vážně chceš už odejít?

trans-unit.source: "This character has short brown hair. Is smart and kind..."
trans-unit.target: "Tato postava má krátké hnědé vlasy. Je hodná a milá..."

trans-unit.source: Did you want to leave without applying changes?
trans-unit.target: Opravdu chceš odejít bez použití změn?

trans-unit.source: Rate and review on Microsoft Store
You will have to leave Focus Mode before you can add a new one.
trans-unit.target: Nejdříve budeš muset opustit Režim soustředění pro přidání nové.

trans-unit.source: There are no characters in this project.
trans-unit.target: V aktuálním projektu zatím nejsou žádné postavy.

trans-unit.source: You can easily add a new character by tapping on the "Add new character" button.
trans-unit.target: Jednoduše můžeš přidat novou postavu kliknutím na tlačítko "Přidat novou postavu".

trans-unit.source: There are no characters in this project.
trans-unit.target: V aktuálním projektu zatím nejsou žádné postavy.

trans-unit.source: This file already exists! Change the name or location otherwise, the file is gonna be replaced.
trans-unit.target: Tento soubor již existuje! Doporučujeme změnit jeho název nebo umístění, jinak bude nahrazen.

trans-unit.source:
Storylines is a modern text editor for writing stories divided into chapters.
Do you love writing stories? With Storylines and its powerful, yet simple and accessible tools, you can easily write anything you could ever think of. There are many options from just a plain text document to a quick draft of your story to an extensive multichapter story with dialogues between characters.
Please note this app is currently in preview, and you may experience some issues when using it.
trans-unit.target:
Storylines is a modern text editor for writing stories divided into chapters.
Do you love writing stories? With Storylines and its powerful, yet simple and accessible tools, you can easily write anything you could ever think of. There are many options from just a plain text document to a quick draft of your story to an extensive multichapter story with dialogues between characters.
Please note this app is currently in preview, and you may experience some issues when using it.

trans-unit.source: Write stories divided into chapters - Write dialogues and export them into popular formats like TXT or JSON - Add characters to your stories - Create and edit text documents - Focus on what matters with Focus Mode, and don’t let any other things distract you while you write - Write your stories with either your keyboard, touch, voice, or a pen
trans-unit.target: Write stories divided into chapters - Write dialogues and export them into popular formats like TXT or JSON - Add characters to your stories - Create and edit text documents - Focus on what matters with Focus Mode, and don’t let any other things distract you while you write - Write your stories with either your keyboard, touch, voice, or a pen
